div.p: A required child element of maintenanceEvent that provides the name of a person, institution, or system responsible for a specific event in the EAS instance's maintenance history, such as its creation, modification, or deletion.

list.label: agentType
list.item: Required (values limited to: human, machine, unknown)

div.p: Use agent to indicate the person, institution, or system responsible for a maintenance event. Examples include the name of the author or encoder, the database responsible for creating the EAS instance, and the style sheet used to update an instance to a new version of the EAS.
Each maintenanceEvent element must have a child agent element.
Use the required agentType attribute to specify whether the agent is "human", "machine", or "unknown".
